Fun game, tricky aiming and rng at first. But after playing for a while it is possible to actually get good. Hacking has become less apparent. But the game is really only good if you bought the game, and don't play for free.
If you get past all the hackers and smurfs its a fun game. Not pay to win so that's something, and it's a great game to play with your friends if I had any.
Game is fun! Not as many cheaters in comp. Surfing is fun too.. meet alot of great people and a boat load of laughs
If anyone is willing to have cancer just play this game it's the best one for this goal.

My favorite Shooter. Movement, aiming and pretty much everything is very different from other games. It's strategic but fast paced. 

One caveat though, if you're going to try it out don't go directly to Competitive. If you want to grind for levels to get free Prime, don't queue up for Mirage or Dust 2. Those two maps are infested with hackers. I suggest playing Casual and watching TheWarOwl on Youtube if you're new to the game. GLHF!
